channel.title: update-torbrowser broken for tor browser 12.0
channel.description:
`update-torbrowser` is broken in the whonix-ws-16 template as of tor browser 12.0. This problem appears to be due to a Tor project change in URLs. The latest files are now located in the following directories:
`https://dist.torproject.org/torbrowser/12.0/` `http://scpalcwstkydpa3y7dbpkjs2dtr7zvtvdbyj3dqwkucfrwyixcl5ptqd.onion/torbrowser/12.0/`

item.title: update-torbrowser broken for tor browser 12.0
item.dc:creator: elihp
item.description:
update-torbrowser is broken in the whonix-ws-16 template as of tor browser 12.0. This problem appears to be due to a Tor project change in URLs. The latest files are now located in the following directories:

https://dist.torproject.org/torbrowser/12.0/
http://scpalcwstkydpa3y7dbpkjs2dtr7zvtvdbyj3dqwkucfrwyixcl5ptqd.onion/torbrowser/12.0/
